II. Purpose of Addendum
Wolverine Human Services Aftercare has moved to a new location, effective
September 18, 2009.
III. Methodology
08/14/2009- An onsite inspection of the new agency location was conducted.
09/18/2009- A CPA application was submitted for a change of address.
09/21/2009- Address change completed and Addendum to the Original Licensing
Report completed.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Wolverine Human Services has moved to a new location, effective September 18,
2009. The new location is 20600 Eureka Rd., Ste. 715, Taylor, MI 48180. An onsite
inspection was conducted by the Licensing Consultant on August 14, 2009. The new
office is located on the 7th floor of the Horizon Business Center. The building is
located on a main street and is close to public transportation and has a large parking
area. The new offices consist of three suites that total 4000 square feet. The new
location has ample room and includes a reception area, visitation rooms, conference
rooms, and both individual office and work stations. The office equipment will be
transferred to the new location.
The Agency’s programs remain the same. The Agency continues to provide Foster
Care and Adoption Services and Independent Living Services. An Interim Licensing
Inspection was conducted on November 13, 2008. The Agency is on a Regular
license, effective November 30, 2007- November 30, 2009.
V. Recommendation
It is recommended that Wolverine Human Services Aftercare continue on a Regular
License.
